ThingDef.label: super steel alloy
ThingDef.description: A spacer-level metal alloy used in military, industrial, and interstellar application. This futuristic alloy in a mixture of iron, and other classified metals, which grants the metal alloy incredible durability, damage resistance, and immunity against fire.

ThingDef.label: mech variant armor plating
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced armor plating that can only be obtained by salvaging heavily armored mech variants. This unknown metallic alloy is considered as one of the most indestructible material that ever existed, in contrast the molecular structure of the armor plating is a triple-layer honey comb structure that are weaved together into a basket case. Truely a state of the art material used to clad murderous death bots with indestructable armor.

ThingDef.label: sensitive mech components
ThingDef.description: An increadibly sensitive mech components that can only be found from mech variant bosses. Theses components are responsible in keeping mech variant bosses function in full capacity without breaking down, and can be used to craft high-tier equipments an useful structures. The only downside is that it deteriorates faster if left outdoors and unattended.

ThingDef.label: mech psycast module
ThingDef.description: A peculiar psycaster module that can be salvaged from mech psionics. This piece of mech hardware is responsible for allowing mech psionics to wield psycast abilities, and it can be installed to a humanoid to enhance the their psychic sensitivity and dissipate neural heat. It can also grant the user the ability to wield a basic psychic bullet, though it requires any level of psylink for the psychic module to be used.

ThingDef.label: mech fusion reactor core
ThingDef.description: A miniature fusion reactor that can only be found inside various mech variant bosses. It draws the power from fusion cores and distributes it throughout their mechanical body, and since the mech variant bosses possess lots of fusion cores, they need a medium to regulate the flow of power form all those fusion core so that they won't overload. The mech fusion reactor core can be used to build power generators that uses fusion cores as fuel, and can be used to craft powerful weapons that uses fusion cores as fuel.

ThingDef.label: advanced gun parts kit
ThingDef.description: Specially manufactured kit that contains all of the sensitive parts necesary to construct high-tech firearms.

ThingDef.label: super steel thread
ThingDef.description: Military-grade fabric made from super steel. This fabric is increadibly durable, immune to deterioration, and fireproof, making it an ideal material for fabricating numerous protective gears.

ThingDef.label: mech fusion core
ThingDef.description: An ultra-tech fussion core that are found inside of powerful mech variants. This fussion core contains an abundant supply of power, which is necessary for any mechanoid variants to function at full capacity. Think of it as the heart of the mechanoid variants.

ThingDef.label: empress blade horn
ThingDef.description: A razor sharp blade horn located near at the empress's smell sensors. Can be used immediately as a weapon, or can be refined into an even powerful melee weapon.

ThingDef.label: gammatron ammo box
ThingDef.description: A highly advanced ammunition used by advanced vulcan turrets.

ThingDef.label: antigrain super shell
ThingDef.description: An increadibly dangerous ammunition, which is made by dismantling fussion cores, extracting its anti matter cells, and fabricate it into an explosive shell used by an advanced antigrain cannon turret. This shell is capable of wiping out groups of mech variants in one fell swoop, and heavily damage mech variant bossess in a single shot.

ThingDef.label: ammo box
ThingDef.description: A metallic box, which is full of high caliber ammunition for the advanced auto turrets.

ThingDef.label: high explosive shell
ThingDef.description: Some high explosive flak cannon shell, which is used by the auto flak cannon turret.

ThingDef.label: high explosive missile
ThingDef.description: A highly explosive missile warhead that is used to arm the air frame missile turret.

ThingDef.label: alpha chip
ThingDef.description: An advanced alpha micro-organ. It is necessary to produce certain advanced types of mechanoids and equipment.\n\nA mechanitor can study this chip to help unlock higher tiers of mechtech research.

li.completedLetter: By studying the alpha chip, {PAWN_labelShort} has acquired the insight needed for the research project(s) {RESEARCH}.\n\nYour researchers can now use research benches to begin researching how to actually use the technology.

progressedLetters.li: By studying the alpha chip, {PAWN_labelShort} realized they ahve only scratched the surface of understanding the insights needed for the technolgy involved\n4 More alpha chips will be needed to fully understand this theoretical knowledge!
By studying the alpha chip, {PAWN_labelShort} slowly begins to understand the concepts needed for {RESEARCH}\n3 More alpha chips will be needed to fully understand this theoretical knowledge!
By studying the alpha chip, {PAWN_labelShort} began to draw conceptual ideas relating to the ideas within the chip!\n2 More alpha chips will be needed to fully understand this theoretical knowledge!

By studying the alpha chip, {PAWN_labelShort} started to create prototype ideas for the content within this chip\nOnly 1 More alpha chips will be needed to fully understand this theoretical knowledge!

li.inspectString: Can be analyzed by a colonist.

ThingDef.label: cargo ship beacon
ThingDef.description: A compact transponder that calls upon a wandering mechanitor cargo ship in space.

li.inspectString: Can be activated to call upon a lost mechanitor cargo ship.\nSelect a colonist and right-click this to activate it.
